summary: Allows you to zoom in and zoom out as much as you wish! Play with a hack-n\'-slash view!
descriptionHtml:
By Lord Dagobeert

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://SkyrimGEMS.com/images/badge_featured_500.png[/img][/url][/center]

This mod allows you to zoom in and zoom out as much as you wish!
Play with a diablo-like camera, get a wider view of the environment, take great screenshots and videos, etc.

At the beginning I used this tweak to get a 1st person view on horseback, but it no longer works since Mounted Combat patch.
author: Lord Dagobert
